name: Half-Lifey
description:
A Half-Life themed VR game made for Epistle 3 Jam!

I had 2 months for this but I got super busy in between, this is the result of 2 days of implementing mechanics I spent about a week creating into a simple level.

NOTE: This game is VR only! 

It was built using SteamVR, so anything that can connect to SteamVR can run the game.

Motion tracked controllers required!
